00008 string trim(string line) {
00009         int left = 0, right = line.length() - 1, off = 0;
00010         
00011         // start
00012         for(; left < line.length(); ++left)
00013                 if(!isspace(line[left]))
00014                         break;
00015         
00016         // end
00017         for(; right >= 0; --right, ++off)
00018                 if(!isspace(line[right]))
00019                         break;
00020         
00021         return line.substr(left, line.length() - left - off);
00022 }
